name: Bobby (Hangarter)
description:
A story driven game where you wake up in a hospital bed and have to convince people you don't have amnesia.

Story:

- You suffered an accident and have amnesia, you're not even sure what happened to you...

- Then you are faced with your girlfriend and a doctor, as soon as you wake up

Gameplay:

- Navigate through the dialogs and try to convince people in front of you that you don't have amnesia!

- You have one minute to become convincing...

Created for one minute game jam!
